front.title: IEEE Draft Standard Test Procedure for Single-Phase Induction Motors

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard covers instructions for conducting and reporting the more generally applicable and acceptabletests to determine the performance characteristics of single-phase induction motors. It is not intended thatthis standard shall cover all possible tests used in production or tests of a research nature. The standardshall not be interpreted as requiring the making of any or all of the tests described herein in any giventransaction.
